CustomField.description: This checkbox indicates whether an IB search performed on a Change Order will search the Top-Level Installed Product records only (true), or if the search will review all installed product records (false).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox indicates whether an IB search performed on a Change Order will search the Top-Level Installed Product records only (true), or if the search will review all installed product records (false).
CustomField.label: Search for Top Level IBs Only
